column4: what is a good pdf reader? xpdf keeps segfaulting on one of my files. the file opens up under osx and even with 'gv' on this ubuntu box. but 'gv' lacks certain features. what other reader is recommended besides xpdf?
i think you can try eliance
i think you can try evince - take a look at www.linuxappfinder.com
evince is what you meant when you said 'eliance'?
